about_the_game:
This game is a demo version of the ShiodomeTrainSimulator.
There is one scenario and benchmark software.
The trial version may not be updated in sync with the production version and may be a bit older, but it probably won't interfere with checking your play. We may update this one from time to time when we make major changes.
detailed_description:
This game is a demo version of the ShiodomeTrainSimulator.
There is one scenario and benchmark software.
The trial version may not be updated in sync with the production version and may be a bit older, but it probably won't interfere with checking your play. We may update this one from time to time when we make major changes.
name: 汐留鉄道シミュレータ Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Core i7 2600
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A realistic fictional railcar driving game is now available! Please enjoy driving on the various types of lines, over 70 km long, multiple tracks, tunnels, and various scenery changes. Single-track sections and many other types of trains are scheduled to be available in the future.
